ThoughtDef.label: killed innocent creature
ThoughtDef.description: I have taken the life of an innocent creature. The Divines teach mercy and protection of the defenseless.

ThoughtDef.label: executed without mercy
ThoughtDef.description: I executed a prisoner without showing the mercy that Stendarr teaches. Divine justice requires compassion.

ThoughtDef.label: divine worship
ThoughtDef.description: I have communed with the Eight Divines. Their blessing fills my soul with peace and righteousness.

ThoughtDef.label: expanded knowledge
ThoughtDef.description: I have expanded the boundaries of understanding. Hermaeus Mora smiles upon those who seek forbidden truths.

ThoughtDef.label: knowledge destroyed
ThoughtDef.description: Knowledge has been lost forever. The Prince of Knowledge abhors such waste of wisdom and learning.

ThoughtDef.label: forbidden knowledge gained
ThoughtDef.description: I have learned secrets that were meant to remain hidden. The dark wisdom fills me with both excitement and dread.

ThoughtDef.label: honored the dead
ThoughtDef.description: I have given proper burial to the departed. The ancestors smile upon such reverence for the ancient ways.

ThoughtDef.label: witnessed dishonor to dead
ThoughtDef.description: The dead lie unburied and dishonored. The ancestors weep for such disregard of proper funeral rites.

ThoughtDef.label: ancestral guidance
ThoughtDef.description: I have received wisdom from the spirits of my forebears. Their ancient knowledge guides my path.

ThoughtDef.label: divine heretic
ThoughtDef.description: This person follows false gods and rejects the righteous path of the Eight Divines.

ThoughtDef.label: fellow seeker
ThoughtDef.description: This person also pursues the path of knowledge and understanding. We share the same thirst for wisdom.

ThoughtDef.label: ancestral kin
ThoughtDef.description: This person honors the ancient ways and shows proper reverence to the spirits of the dead.
